text.name: Both of You, Shut Up
text.desc:
At 7+ [RedEyeFirst], Coin Power +1
At 7+ [PenanceFirst], Clash Power +1

text.name: Both of You, Shut Up
text.desc:
At 7+ [RedEyeFirst], Coin Power +1
At 7+ [PenanceFirst], Clash Power +2

text.name: S.H. / S.F.
text.desc: If the sum of [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] is 20 or higher, Coin Power +1

text.name: S.H. / S.F.
text.desc:
If the sum of [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] is 20 or higher, Coin Power +1
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1

text.name: S.H. / S.F.
text.desc:
If the sum of [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] is 15 or higher, Coin Power +1
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] At 7+ [RedEyeFirst], gain 1 [Agility] next turn (2 times per turn)

text.name: Skullbuster
text.desc:
[BeforeUse] If [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] are both at 15+, activate 'Serious Skullbuster' instead
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At max SP, Coin Power +1
- [EndSkill] If this effect activated, lose 15 SP
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by ([PenanceFirst]/3)% of each unit's max HP
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ([PenanceFirst] - 10) SP (min 0)

text.name: Skullbuster
text.desc:
[BeforeUse] If [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] are both at 15+, activate 'Serious Skullbuster' instead
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At max SP, Clash Power +2 and Coin Power +1
- [EndSkill] If this effect activated, lose 15 SP
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by ([PenanceFirst]/2)% of each unit's max HP
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ([PenanceFirst] - 10) SP (min 0)

text.name: Serious Skullbuster
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume all [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] on self
- Coin Power +1 for every 5 [RedEyeFirst] consumed (max 4)
- Base Power +1 for every 5 [PenanceFirst] consumed (max 4)
[EndSkill] Lose 15 SP and gain [Emptiness] next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Laceration] equal to ([RedEyeFirst] consumed - 15) on target (max 5)
Deal +2.5% damage for every [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] consumed (max 100%)

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by ([PenanceFirst] consumed / 2)% of each unit's max HP
- Heal 1 additional ally for every 2 highest Reson. (max 2 more allies)

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ([PenanceFirst] consumed - 10) SP
- Heal 1 additional ally for every 2 highest Reson. (max 2 more allies)
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Binding] and 2 [Reduction] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Serious Skullbuster
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume all [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] on self
- Coin Power +1 for every 5 [RedEyeFirst] consumed (max 4)
- Base Power +1 for every 5 [PenanceFirst] consumed (max 4)
[EndSkill] Lose 15 SP and gain [Emptiness] next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Laceration] equal to ([RedEyeFirst] consumed - 15) on target (max 5)
Deal +4% damage for every [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] consumed (max 160%)

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by ([PenanceFirst] consumed)% of each unit's max HP
- Heal 1 additional ally for every 2 highest Reson. (max 2 more allies)

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ([PenanceFirst] consumed - 5) SP
- Heal 1 additional ally for every 2 highest Reson. (max 2 more allies)
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Binding] and 2 [Reduction] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Mealtime, Bedtime
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Gain 2 [RedEyeFirst] (once per turn)
- At less than 7 [RedEyeFirst], gain +1 additional [RedEyeFirst]

[OnSucceedAttack] Gain 2 [PenanceFirst] (once per turn)
- At less than 7 [PenanceFirst], gain +1 additional [PenanceFirst]

1041001.name: Spiderhead/Skullface
1041001.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Coin that gains [RedEyeFirst]:
- Deal +([RedEyeFirst]/2)% damage
- If the target has [Laceration], gain 1 [RedEyeFirst] (3 times per turn)

When hitting an enemy with a Coin that gains [PenanceFirst]:
- Deal +([PenanceFirst]/2)% damage
- At 20+ SP, gain 1 [PenanceFirst] (3 times per turn)

1041002.name: E.G.O Assimilation
1041002.desc:
When gaining [Charge] Count, gain [RedEyeFirst] or [PenanceFirst] instead
- [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] are unaffected by [Charge] Potency

1041011.name: Spiderhead/Skullface
1041011.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Coin that gains [RedEyeFirst]:
- Deal +([RedEyeFirst]/2)% damage
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, deal an additional +([RedEyeFirst]/2)% damage
- If the target has [Laceration], gain 1 [RedEyeFirst] (3 times per turn)

When hitting an enemy with a Coin that gains [PenanceFirst]:
- Deal +([PenanceFirst]/2)% damage
- If the target's SP is lower than this unit's, deal an additional +([PenanceFirst]/2)% damage(targets without SP: their SP counts as 0)
- At 20+ SP, gain 1 [PenanceFirst] (3 times per turn)

When hit by an enemy, gain 1 [PenanceFirst] (max 3)

1041021.name: Eat and Sleep
1041021.desc:
Combat Start:
- 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage heals 3 HP
- 1 ally with the least SP heals 3 SP

notes.short: Has 2 versions of {status:Charge}, one giving {status:Laceration} buffs and the other giving SP on hit and shield buffs. At 15+ of both, consumes all of both when using S3 to use S3-2 instead.
notes.full:
She has 2 Unique Charges. {status:RedEyeFirst} gives her bonus {status:Laceration} application. {status:PenanceFirst} gives SP healing on hit and a passive HP shield every turn. Both versions give bonus damage an increase their effects based on their stage. The stage is based on how much Count you have of that Charge with stage 1 being 1-7, stage 2 being 8-15, and stage 3 being 16-20. Both versions are gained with all skills as well as passively on hit if the target has {status:Laceration} for {status:RedEyeFirst} and if {sinner:4} has 20+ SP for {status:PenanceFirst}. Gaining {status:Charge} Count from external sources will randomly assign it to one of the two.

At 15+ of both versions, her S3 will be converted into S3-2, consuming all Count of both in the process. Her S3-2 inflicts additional {status:Laceration}, deals more damage, and heals HP and SP for herself and an ally based on how much of the two Charges she consumed (Her regular S3 also inflicts {status:Laceration} and heals HP and SP, but does less without consuming either Charge). Using it with Res also increases the number of allies healed. It also inflicts {status:Binding} and {status:Reduction} next turn. After using S3-2, she gains {status:Emptiness} preventing her from building either Charge versions for a turn. Gaining {status:RedEyeFirst} will instead heal her and an ally's HP, while gaining {status:PenanceFirst} heals their SP. Both versions will drain her SP by 15 on use.
